A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson has created a masterpiece with the Last Jedi. Star Wars has to move on\, evolve in the right way. This gives the whole series hope and reignites the story. Why would we all want to sit down over and over again and watch the same garbage regurgitated until the end of time. Let's put the 80's Star Wars to sleep and let Johnson weave the story of a new generation\, a different battle\, a spiritual one instead of the guns and explosions! Because my friends that is our fight now...a fight for freedom\, segregation\, lack of belonging...Last Jedi is clearly the best film since Return Of The Jedi...!!!! Crazy reviews
